page.title: 15Recreation in Wolverhampton
page.content:
Sport of all kinds is becoming increasingly popular in Wolverhampton. In Wolverhampton there are about 1150 acres of local parks and open spaces, and now the council feels justified in boasting about having some of the best facilities in the country. There are several sports complexes like Wolverhampton Stadium,Compton Park Activity Centre and the Central Baths. In West Park there are many facilities for recreation. These range from a playground for the small children to rowing boats for the older people. For those who prefer to watch others exert themselves,there is the football stadium and the race course.
***************************************
